channel.title: Cant find JDK 6
channel.description: i cant find JDK 6 on mad tahroks guide i click on page to download it and only thing there similiar is JDK 6 update 1 and it doesnt work

item.title: Cant find JDK 6
item.dc:creator: @2pure4u 2pure4u
item.description:
@2pure4u wrote:

JDK 6 update 1 does work, here is how you get it to work.
Go to control panel>system>advanced>environmental variables.
After you make the new PATH and stuff like that change the text in it to:

C:Windows\System32\;"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\" for Class and

"C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\" for classpath and

C:Windows\System32\;"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\" for PATH and

C:Windows\System32\;"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\" for pathtext

Read full topic
